Function reference

All functions

ECSI
European Customer Satisfaction Index
Russett
Russett data
available_methods()
Available methods for RGCCA
plot(<bootstrap>)
Plot a fitted rgcca_bootstrap object
plot(<cval>)
Plot for cross-validation
plot(<permutation>)
Plot a fitted rgcca permutation object
plot(<rgcca>)
Plot for RGCCA
plot(<stability>)
Plot a rgcca_stability object.
print(<bootstrap>)
Print a rgcca_bootstrap object
print(<cval>)
Print a rgcca_cv object
print(<permutation>)
Print a rgcca_permutation object
print(<rgcca>)
Print the call of rgcca results
print(<stability>)
Print a rgcca_stability object.
rgcca()
Regularized Generalized Canonical Correlation Analysis (RGCCA)
rgcca_bootstrap()
Bootstrap confidence intervals and p-values
rgcca_cv()
Tune RGCCA parameters by cross-validation
rgcca_permutation()
Tune the S/RGCCA hyper-parameters by permutation
rgcca_predict()
Make predictions using RGCCA
rgcca_stability()
Identify the most stable variables with SGCCA
rgcca_transform()
Reduce dimensionality using RGCCA
